title: Can't log in?
body: I played the game earlier, then had to close the client. The client didn't respond when I tried to reopen it, so I clicked on the option to restore the client. Now it keeps saying the username or password is incorrect. I reset the password, but nothing happened. How do I fix this?

replies.body: You're probably having the same [**login issues**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Oe3XBf34-incorrect-username-or-password) some other players have been hitting recently. If it's still happening, I'd like to have you try switching your region on the patcher and then switching it back to normal. It doesn't sound like much, but that should force a patch to download which will let you log back in. Hit me back up if that's not helping!
Didn't even have to do that. Just played a few games of Overwatch last night and then tried to log back in afterwards and it worked.
